Class BasePVStructure

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
PVField, PVStructure, Requester, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasePVRecord
public class BasePVStructure
extends AbstractPVField
implements PVStructure

Base class for a PVStructure.

Author:
mrk
